title: Mike Spinelli & Alex Roy
description:
Mike Spinelli is an OG of auto journalism, and one of the founders of Jalopnik.com. He is now Executive Video Producer at TheDRIVE.com, and a host of "/DRIVE" on NBC Sports. Alex Roy once held the transcontinental driving record, covers autonomous cars and tech for TheDRIVE.com, and also hosts "/DRIVE". 

This show is a video! https://youtu.be/6iKclZFI9Io


Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @mikespin @alexroy144
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @mikespinelli @alexroy144

Check out our merch!
https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
